name: whup
content:
whup verb [T]
(HIT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
to hit a person or animal, usually several times and especially as a punishment: He drove the boy home and made his mama promise not to whup him.offensive They told my parents they should "Whup her ass."
More examplesFewer examplesHe said if I didn't whup that boy the next day that he'd whup me.Your mama’s gonna whup you for swearing.We are told that he first went into a boxing gym the day he had his bike stolen, because he wanted to "whup" the thief.

whup verb [T]
(DEFEAT)
to defeat someone very easily in a game or competition: He looked like he could whup anyone in a wrestling match.offensive We played pool with a couple of guys and whupped their asses.
More examplesFewer examplesHe declared that he was the greatest and that he could whup any man alive.I thought that our boys would whup their opponents.We are lucky to have two such good candidates; either one of them could whup the Republicans.
